item.dc:creator: @tremendouse tremendouse
item.description:
@tremendouse wrote:

Make it smaller.

can you explain more what i should make smaller? the parseincomingpackets void? i did no results.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 07:37:37 AM[/size][hr]Alright i kept taking off the original parse cases to the parse incomingpackets void 2

and now its like frozen at this

item.title: [Help]ParseIncomingPackets Error
item.dc:creator: @tremendouse tremendouse
item.description:
@tremendouse wrote:

Hi, i have been suffering from this problem since last year, and i realy like editing RS2 servers, and i have a great one.

but while editing it, i came up with this error ’ Parseincomingpackets(){ ’

I followed many guides, but it didn’t work, i thought it was my problem that i didn’t get what the guides point at, so i left.

now i came back, and i want to fix it, may i have a step-by-step guide by any good hearted-person around? thanks in advance.
